title: RetroGames is up and running!
body:
My friends from

goodolddownloads.com
just launched a new super section on their site. Now not only they serve modern games (scene releases and GOG games) with direct links and no ads bullshit, but also good old retro stuff from consoles. If 3DO, Amiga, Dreamcast mean something to you – go right there and grab everything you can.
